MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the FK7 postcode area of Stirling. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.53pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the electrical network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:27 PM on Friday, 23 April 2021.
